choice-1: Tan leve que no puedo decidir
choice-5: Extremo, más que en cualquier otro momento de mi vida

prompts.label-spanish: 1. Libertad de las limitaciones de su yo personal y sensación de unidad o vínculo con algo que se sentía más grande que usted mismo.
prompts.label-english: Freedom from the limitations of your personal self and feeling a unity or bond with what was felt to be greater than your personal self.

prompts.label-spanish: 2. Experiencia del ser puro y la conciencia pura (más allá del mundo de las impresiones sensoriales).
prompts.label-english: Experience of pure being and pure awareness (beyond the world of sense impressions).

prompts.label-spanish: 3. Experiencia de unidad con un 'mundo interior'.
prompts.label-english: Experience of oneness in relation to an “inner world” within.

prompts.label-spanish: 4. Experiencia de la fusión de su yo personal con un todo más grande.
prompts.label-english: Experience of the fusion of your personal self into a larger whole.

prompts.label-spanish: 5. Experiencia de unidad con la realidad última.
prompts.label-english: Experience of unity with ultimate reality.

prompts.label-spanish: 6. Sentir que experimentó la eternidad o el infinito.
prompts.label-english: Feeling that you experienced eternity or infinity.

prompts.label-spanish: 7. Experiencia de unión con objetos y/o personas percibidas en su entorno.
prompts.label-english: Experience of oneness or unity with objects and/or persons perceived in your surroundings.

prompts.label-spanish: 8. Experimentar la certeza de que 'Todo es Uno'.
prompts.label-english: Experience of the insight that 'all is One'.

prompts.label-spanish: 9. Consciencia de la presencia de vida en todas las cosas.
prompts.label-english: Awareness of the life or living presence in all things.

prompts.label-spanish: 10. Adquisición de conocimiento experimentado a un nivel intuitivo.
prompts.label-english: Gain of insightful knowledge experienced at an intuitive level.

prompts.label-spanish: 11. Certeza de haber encontrado una realidad última (en el sentido de ser capaz de 'conocer' y 'ver' qué es realmente real durante tu experiencia).
prompts.label-english: Certainty of encounter with ultimate reality (in the sense of being able to 'know' and 'see' what is really real at some point during your experience.

prompts.label-spanish: 12. Estás convencido ahora, si mirás hacia atrás en tu experiencia, que encontraste la realidad última (esto es, que vos 'supiste' y 'viste' qué es realmente real).
prompts.label-english: You are convinced now, as you look back on your experience, that in it you encountered ultimate reality (i.e., that you 'knew' and 'saw' what was really real).

prompts.label-spanish: 13. Sensación de haber alcanzado un hito en un nivel espiritual.
prompts.label-english: Sense of being at a spiritual height.

prompts.label-spanish: 14. Sensación de reverencia.
prompts.label-english: Sense of reverence.

prompts.label-spanish: 15. Sentir que experimentaste algo profundamente sagrado y santo.
prompts.label-english: Feeling that you experienced something profoundly sacred and holy.

prompts.label-spanish: 16. Experimentar asombro.
prompts.label-english: Experience of amazement.

prompts.label-spanish: 17. Experimentar sensibilidad y gentileza.
prompts.label-english: Feelings of tenderness and gentleness.

prompts.label-spanish: 18. Sensación de paz y tranquilidad.
prompts.label-english: Feelings of peace and tranquility.

prompts.label-spanish: 19. Experiencia de éxtasis.
prompts.label-english: Experience of ecstasy.

prompts.label-spanish: 20. Sentido de asombro o genialidad.
prompts.label-english: Sense of awe or awesomeness.

prompts.label-spanish: 21. Sentimientos de alegría.
prompts.label-english: Feelings of joy.

prompts.label-spanish: 22. Pérdida de tu sentido usual del tiempo.
prompts.label-english: Loss of your usual sense of time.

prompts.label-spanish: 23. Pérdida de tu sentido usual del espacio.
prompts.label-english: Loss of your usual sense of space.

prompts.label-spanish: 24. Pérdida de la conciencia habitual de dónde estabas
prompts.label-english: Loss of usual awareness of where you were.

prompts.label-spanish: 25. Sentido de estar 'fuera del' tiempo, más allá del pasado y el futuro
prompts.label-english: Sense of being 'outside of' time, beyond past and future.

prompts.label-spanish: 26. Estar en un reino sin límites de espacio.
prompts.label-english: Being in a realm with no space boundaries.

prompts.label-spanish: 27. Experiencia de atemporalidad.
prompts.label-english: Experience of timelessness.

prompts.label-spanish: 28. Sensación de que esa experiencia no se puede describir adecuadamente con palabras
prompts.label-english: Sense that the experience cannot be described adequately in words.

prompts.label-spanish: 29. Sentir que no podría hacer justicia a su experiencia describiéndola con palabras.
prompts.label-english: Feeling that you could not do justice to your experience by describing it in words.

prompts.label-spanish: 30. Sentir que sería difícil comunicar su propia experiencia a otras personas que no han tenido experiencias similares.
prompts.label-english: Feeling that it would be difficult to communicate your own experience to others who have not had similar experiences.
